tags.description: Sizeable Group Use Campsite at the back edge of the Alberta foothills. Gives an amazing view of the forested valley below and the Rocky Mountains to the West
tags.name: Shunda Viewpoint Group Use Site
tags.note: Predators prevalent in the area. Watch for bears, mountain lions and wolves. Carry bear spray and be aware of your surroundings. Practice proper food storage for the backcountry
